search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6601_1201_020:
What’re you just standing there for? Yeesh.
Not too reliable, are ya?
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6601_1201_030:
Today you’ll get a crash course in beatdowns,
straight from the master himself—me!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6601_1201_040: Here’s your task. It’s simple: smash all these rocks!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6601_1201_050:
Gather all your strength, smash right through ’em,
and keep moving forward!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6602_1201_010: Your task’s simple: smash all these rocks!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6602_1201_020:
Gather all your strength, smash right through ’em,
and keep moving forward!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6603_1201_030:
Heh! Want to free our little hostage? Well, I
think we can work out a deal...if you hand over
your Pokémon!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6603_1201_050:
Good luck getting through Machamp’s mighty
boulder barricade! It won’t break easily!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6603_1201_060:
A boulder barricade, huh? Well, this oughta
be good!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6603_1201_070:
It’s just begging to be smashed! Go for
it, Golisopod!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6604_1201_010:
Hey! What’s the holdup? This ain’t the time for
standing around slack-jawed!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6604_1201_020:
Let’s go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Time to bust
some rocks...and some Team Break heads!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_1201_010: How’d they break through so quickly?!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_1201_020:
All right, punks! What flavor of beatdown will it
be today?
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_1201_030:
Eeek! N-no, spare us! We’re sorry! We messed
up bad!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_1201_040:
Really? Giving up already? Flimsy buncha
punks, ain’tcha?
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_1201_050: Or so we’d like you to think!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_1201_060:
Wha—?! You were back there, too? Grrr!
You tricked me into letting my guard down!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_0401_080:
Wh-whoa! You can’t just attack out of nowhere—
that’s cheating!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_1201_120:
Well, you punks sure went and did it now. Hope
you’re ready for full-blast Guzma!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_1201_130:
N-nooo! We’re sorry! We’ll back down, for real
this time!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6605_1201_150:
Hmph! Don’t bother thanking us, kid. You just
happened to be right in our smashing path.
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6606_1201_010:
Huh? What’s your problem? Looking to get in my
way and catch a beatdown?
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6606_1201_020:
Meh. After today, at least I know you ain’t the
type to just stand around flat-footed.
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6606_1201_030:
I thought about trying to cram in some more
training, but ya know...I’m feelin’ done! Let’s call
it a day.
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6606_1201_040:
See ya round, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ll give you a shout next time I’m feeling up to it!
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6607_1201_010:
Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Fancy meeting you here.
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6607_1201_020:
I heard they’ve got some pretty tasty cocoa at a
café just past here.
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6607_1201_030: I was just on my way to try it. How’s that sound?
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6607_1201_040: Feel free to tag along, if you want.
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6608_1201_010:
Wow. They’ve got a good range of shops
here, huh?
search_2030_guzma_plumeria/6608_1201_020:
With this many options, it’s easy to get distracted
from what you came for.
